name: Battle RC
description:
Welcome to Battle RC, a thrilling and exciting robot combat game!

Battle against a variety of bots and crush them with strategy and skill. Players have the opportunity to unleash their creativity using the intuitive tools of Tinkercad to construct their very own robot models. Once your creation is complete, it's time to put it to the test in exhilarating solo matches or against other players locally.

Pit your robot against a variety of AI opponents. Adapt your tactics on the fly as you navigate through diverse arenas and environments, honing your skills with every victory. Play tournaments against other players locally and see if your bots are good enough to win! Are you prepared to dominate the arena and claim victory in Battle RC?

· Up to 4 Players In 2v2 Matches
· 16 Bots to Choose From
· Workshop to View, Edit, and Import Custom Bots
· 12 Arenas to Battle In
· Tournament Mode With 3 Different Bracket Sizes
· Share Your Own Bot Creations With Your Friends

Stay tuned for more bots, arenas, and more to come!
